line_1: That each may give his Friend Assistance.
line_2: These dwell at such convenient Distance,

line_1: But I can call to my Assistance

line_2: You gain a prospect two fields distance.

line_1: Go lend the scullion your assistance;
line_2: Hence then, Sir Brine, and keep your distance:

line_1: And, with a civet cat's assistance,
line_2: The rabble keep at awful distance.
